name: Premanco Ventures
overview:
Premanco Ventures is a Silicon Valley based company focused on identifying and investing in innovative technologies that have transformational potential in emerging markets.

Premanco represents select corporate partners, investors and entrepreneurs from around the world who are interested in leapfrog technologies for the benefit of emerging and under-served markets.

Innovation is the primary engine of economic growth and wealth creation and Silicon Valley is the global epicenter for technological innovation and venture capital.

Premanco proactively seeks innovative technologies in Silicon Valley and elsewhere that have transformational economic potential to generate wealth, create jobs and alleviate poverty.
